ThingDef.label: Imperialist Sniper
ThingDef.description: A Sniper rifle of unmatched quality, The Impreialist was manufactured and mass produced by Sparrow Tek Industries, One of its standout features is the advanced holographic scope, which seamlessly projects its sights directly into the user's eye. Rumors have it that this integration extends beyond mere visual aid, with some speculating that the rifle somehow synchronizes its sights with the user's mind. This purported connection contributes to an unparalleled sense of perfection in the hands of seasoned sniper experts, enhancing their accuracy and efficiency in the field.

ThingDef.label: Tek EMP PulseRifle
ThingDef.description: The E23 EMP PulseRifle, a widely used assault rifle by Sparrow Tek Industries. The pulse rifle E23 Variant fires 40 rounds of electrified uranium munitions, with good range and accuracy, making this rifle effective against mechs and humans alike it is also useful to very specific entities, it is costly to create.\n\n<color=#0052FF> A mechanoid from the Blue Tek Series may have a chance to spawn with this weapon instead of their normal weapon.</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek Flame PulseRifle
ThingDef.description: A very rare assault rifle by Sparrow Tek Industries. The pulse rifle F72 Variant fires 40 rounds of incinderary munitions, with good range and accuracy, making this rifle extremely effective against human-likes and entitys, however its not as effective against mechanoids.\n\n<color=#FF0000> A mechanoid from the Red Tek Series may have a chance to spawn with this instead of their normal weapon. </color>

ThingDef.label: Tek PulseRifle MK 2
ThingDef.description: A somewhat common assault rifle by Sparrow Tek Industries. The G10 pulse rifle fires 40 rounds of Depleted Uranium, with decent range and accuracy, this version was developed earlier in then the others so it is cheaper and weaker and much more common then the others, it also has a small chance to stun targets. It is great at hunting animals and average at all other target types.\n\n<color=#FFFF00> This Weapon upgrades from the standard tek pulse rifle and can be upgraded to either the F72 fire type or E23 emp type tek pulse rifle. Mechanoids from the Yellow Tek Series may spawn with this instead.</color>

ThingDef.label: Poison Tek PulseRifle
ThingDef.description: A widely used assault rifle by Sparrow Tek Industries. The pulse rifle T77 Variant was originally created to appeal to other markets, attempting to attract attention to militias that could make the most use out of them. The T77 Fires 35 Rounds of Toxic munitions, making the enemy sick with toxic buildup, it does poorly against mechanoids, Wasters love this weapon.\n\n<color=#00FF21> This weapon is an upgrade from the U00 standard Tek Pulse rifle. A Mechanoid from the Green Tek Series may spawn with this instead of their normal weapon.</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek FireBombs
ThingDef.description: Fragile containers filled with super heated sticky gels, these will burst into flames when thrown.\n\n<color=#FF0000> HANDLE WITH EXTREME CARE!</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek Bow - Judicator
ThingDef.description: An energy bow, while it may seem difficult to use, this bow is extremely light, and can fire arrows at extremely fast speeds, it has been reported to feel great to use by tribals and glitter world soldiers alike. manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries.

ThingDef.label: FireBomb Launcher
ThingDef.description: A grenade launcher, designed to shoot Sparrow Tek Fire bomb grenades at high velocity, the grenades coming out of this will splatter in a very large burst of flames.

ThingDef.label: Tek ToxBombs
ThingDef.description: Fragile containers filled with Toxic gas, these will burst into Toxic Fumes when thrown.

ThingDef.label: ToxBomb Launcher
ThingDef.description: A grenade launcher, designed to shoot Sparrow Tek Toxic bomb grenades at high velocity, the grenades coming out of this will splatter in a very large burst of toxic fumes.

ThingDef.label: Rot Bomb Launcher
ThingDef.description: A grenade launcher, It appears to be modified from a Tox bomb launcher, the grenades coming out of this will splatter a very nasty and disgusting scented fumes.

ThingDef.label: Anti Matter Bomb Launcher
ThingDef.description: A grenade launcher, Modified to fire special 'thump' rounds, the grenades from this will do damage structures and large creatures, but will not do as much to smaller creatures.

ThingDef.label: ICX Rock Cannon
ThingDef.description: An extremely heavy Cannon like energy-based Rocket Launcher, The rock cannon is capable of decimating anything unfortunate enough to be on the other end of the barrel, its very heavy and would require lots of strength to carry the weapon alone, let alone fire it. The blast from this weapon will Tear down even the mightest of enemies..

ThingDef.label: Tek charge lance
ThingDef.description: An upgraded pulse charged rail gun, this weapon is an expiremental attempt at making a more powerful, yet heavier charge lance weapon.\n\n<color=#00FFFF> Standard Mechanoid Lancers, Advanced Mechanoid Lancers and Tek Mechanoid Lancers have a chance to spawn with this weapon instead.</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek charge lance R
ThingDef.description: An upgraded pulse charged rail gun, this weapon is an expiremental attempt at making a more powerful, yet heavier charge lance weapon. This is a special fire version by Sparrow Tek, specifically for Red lancers.

ThingDef.label: Tek charge lance B
ThingDef.description: An upgraded pulse charged rail gun, this weapon is an expiremental attempt at making a more powerful, yet heavier charge lance weapon. a special emp version by Sparrow Tek, specifically for Blue lancers.

ThingDef.label: Tek PulseRifle
ThingDef.description: The U00 Tek PulseRifle, a commonly used assault rifle by Sparrow Tek Industries. This is the first prototype of Sparrow Tek's Newest Weapon development, using uranium depleted rounds, this rifle shoots 40 rounds of a nonstop energy barrage which is very accurate and very good range, however it doesn't do alot of damage and has been known to be difficult to make, Many glitter world militaries use this weapon.\n\n<color=#00FFFF> This weapon is modular and can be upgraded to stronger variants of itself, starting with this the U00 can be upgraded to either the T77 Toxic pulse rifle, or the G10 Stun pulse rifle, the stun pulse rifle which then can be upgraded to the E23 EMP pulse rifle, or the F72 Flame pulse rifle. the steps taken for these upgrades cannot be reversed and are expensive to produce!</color>
